topic.title: /GAFAM/ board at Millchan
topic.body: There is a [/GAFAM/ board](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X:GAFAM:0) at ZeroNet's 4Chan, aka Millchan. If you also love to hate Google, Apple, Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft and the surveillance capitalism they represent, then that's your place to casually discuss your nightmares and share your memes about them.
